title: Painting
provenance_text:
Antoni Tàpies [1923-2012], Barcelona, Spain [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 430, illustrated in the catalogue, plate 59) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on November 21, 1958.
